title: Conference Board's Franco Sees 'Positive News' in CCI (Audio)
itunes:title: Conference Board's Franco Sees 'Positive News' in CCI (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Lynn Franco, Director of Economic Indicators of the Conference Board, with an overview of their August CCI (Consumer Confidence Index) report.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
